articles.title: SLC 'very confident' of hosting Asia Cup despite political crisis - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Sri Lanka recently hosted Australia, and Pakistan have recently arrived in the island nation for a Test series
articles.content: The Asia Cup Qualifier is due to run from August 20 to 26, and the main tournament from August 27 to September 11  •  Getty Images
